item.title: The Best Way To Learn English (In my humble opinion.)
item.description: This note is based on the English courseã€ŠLearn English with Bob the canadianã€‹. Copyright: For study only , no business use. WHAT YOU NEED 1ï¼‰Time: 1 hour per day (30 minutes will work as well). Monday through Friday. 2ï¼‰Tools: A notebook and a pen to write down new vocabulary each day. 3ï¼‰literature: A English song, a English book, a English television show. internet connection Which I’m pretty sure you have because you’re reading the blog.
